description: This file defines a User model class with JSON serialization features, including properties for id, email, name, and loyalty points. It uses annotations for JSON serialization and includes factory methods for JSON conversion.

classes.name: User
classes.description: A data model representing a user with JSON serialization support.

methods.name: User.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a User instance from JSON data.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts a User instance to a JSON-compatible map.
